# titanic
```{r}
df <- TitanicSurvival
summary(df)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(df, aes(survived,fill=sex)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")+
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(passengerClass,fill=survived)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")+
  theme_minimal()
```
